content.description: Directions: You will now listen to several selections. For each selection, ﬁrst you will have time to read the questions silently. Then you will hear the selection. You may take notes as you listen. Your notes will not be graded. After listening to each selection, you will have time to answer the questions. For each question, choose the response that is best according to the selection and mark your answer.
